Package fi.tuni.tiko

Class MainMenuScreen

java.lang.Object
com.badlogic.gdx.InputAdapter
com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Stage
fi.tuni.tiko.Screen
fi.tuni.tiko.MainMenuScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor, com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
public class MainMenuScreen
extends Screen
The MainMenuScreen class is a screen shown as the main menu. It has predetermined answers at the bottom and an image of the game's title at the top of the screen. None of its answers need confirmation. It has more complicated effects for answers being chosen than just moving to a new screen.

  • Constructor Details

    • MainMenuScreen

      public MainMenuScreen()
      Creates the MainMenuScreen. The game's title's size determined based on how much room the answers take up.

  • Method Details

    • createAnswerBoxes

      public void createAnswerBoxes()
      Creates answer boxes. They begin from a fixed height.

    • nextScreen

      public void nextScreen​(int screenLink)
      What happens when one of the answers is chosen. The choices are loading a new game, continuing an old save, opening settings and closing the game.
      Overrides:
      nextScreen in class Screen
      Parameters:
      screenLink - The ID number that determines which choice has been chosen.
